author: Bellular News
description:
Tariffs. Age gates. Antitrust. The EU. Gaming slipped under the radar for years. Then 2025 hit all at once.

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!

00:00 The Law Caught Up
00:54 Why Everything Costs More Now
03:53 The EU Came For Microtransactions
09:10 The "PlayStation Tax" Reckoning
11:03 "How Old Are You?"
13:57 The Industry Had Nothing
